1.20.1.1.0.1: Remove "set" command and add it's subsequence execution to "add" command instead. "add" command can now also add item resource id instead of tag alone.
1.20.1.1.0.2: Rewritten keybinding code. Should be working now, if it's not working before.
1.20.1.1.0.3: Fix keybinding name swap with its category name in the option.
1.20.1.1.0.4: Change common config to client since the server dist doesn't need them.

1.20.2.1.0.4: Port to Forge Minecraft 1.20.2 new network system
